website_summaries.verdict: A good quality satin set that stands out for its high-end look and feel.
pros: Loved for both its style and rich colors, this set is well made and offers a silky, soft feel
This set also gets top marks for holding up well to repeated washings, and it tends to resist shrinking and wrinkling as well
cons: A few were not completely satisfied with the fit and needed alterations
Some felt it was not as breathable as some other fabrics on the market, and it is prone to static cling

customer_reviews.title: Happy girls
customer_reviews.text: My little sister and I started a tradition last year of getting matching Christmas jammies. I'm 5'6 118lbs and I'm wearing a small. She's 5'8 and wearing a medium. They are SO comfy. Plenty of room, not to heavy not too light. Completely satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Decent pair of pjs
customer_reviews.text: The style and fit of these pajamas are nice. They did feel a bit stiff when I first put them on. Perhaps washing them before wearing them would be best this way they are softer feeling. Also they did stain my nails and white sheets. So washing them before wearing would be a good idea to help prevent this from happening. The fit of these pajamas is loose. For better sizing info, I'm 5'5" 145 and I got size large. I usually get a medium but this particular style runs small based on their size chart. Large fit perfect and not too loose.
customer_reviews.author: ModernMom

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pjs, I have a problem with chub rub so after always wearing nightgowns thought I'd try silk pjs, I move alot so always silky nightgowns too. I ordered 2 pair the lepoard and black...love them, when I turn in bed, they turn with me, no more inner thighs touching! Problem solved! They wash nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: cindy strohl

customer_reviews.title: Love the black & white
customer_reviews.text: Love the black & white,l didn't like the other colors! I usually get them for VSecret, but wanted to get something less expensive.Im 5.2 and 130 lbs, 36D and l got a small.They are perfect and not tight or to long.Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: I love these pjs! I'm 5'9" and 145 lbs. I usually wear a size 8 (medium), but I ordered these pjs in size large. They fit perfectly! The pants are long enough and the buttons don't gap on the shirt. The fabric isn't itchy and the color is beautiful. I only wish there were pockets in the pants. I absolutely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pajamas, but not well sewn together
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size larger than I usually wear, because I like my pjs loose. The color is beautiful and the fabric is soft and silky and the top fits fine. However, the legs on the bottom are way too long, and there is a sewing mistake on one leg, so that there appears to be a rip in the fabric. I can sew it up, and had to shorten the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: The fit is a little large but since I like to have PJs a bit looser they are keepers
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of satin PJs. The fit is a little large but since I like to have PJs a bit looser they are keepers. The only complaint I have is that if you sweat any during the night it will line the inside of the PJ, so they are not "breathable." I believe that that is to be expected with satin. The product is not defective it is just something to think about when you choose satin. I like the teal color really well. And you get a matching eye mask with these something that is missing in the description, I believe so that was a nice little extra!
customer_reviews.author: Martha Davis

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pajamas! This is the 4th pair I have bought in recent weeks. I'm a silk pajamas lover and can tell you this fabric is very luxurious and quality made. They come in a flat, folded package and will look very wrinkly when first taken out, however all the wrinkles immediately fall out as soon as you wash and dry them. I also recommend buying them big, simply because silk pajamas don't "give" when you sit down.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Dunigan

customer_reviews.title: Pjs
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect fit and great quality! They are perfect for my friends wedding and all of us bridesmaids!
customer_reviews.author: Alexus Beatty

customer_reviews.title: Butt and top odd fit
customer_reviews.text: Wierd fit the pants length fit my 5’ 9” body but so tight on size 14 butt i was worried it would rip. I did not spend much time on the top because I put that on second but I did notice the sleeves are really short and it felt like it would be hard to buckle with a larger chest fabric felt nice so sadd but need to return
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Best PJ's Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Best and most comfortable PJs I have ever owned. Bought 3 pair, so I always have clean ones, Low maintenance, machine washable, lightweight for travel and do not show stains. Fabric feels really good on my skin. All of that and a great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Izzy Felder

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: A huge 3-inch hole opened up on the inner leg after just one use. Sad because the fabric feels nice. But I would not recommend. Spend a little more on another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Super cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the rose pink but received more of a PURPLE then anything! But I kept it anyways too lazy to return it. It still worked out! Looked so cute
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: For the modern woman
customer_reviews.text: I would have given 5 stars but the pants are cut for the modern woman who wears pants lower on the waist than I like. The rise is too short for my liking. I had to get extra material and add to the top to make them fit comfortably. The material raveled badly when I was sewing the addition, so I wonder how well it will hold up to repeated washings, But so far it has held up well. I especially like that they make it easy to slide on our sheets.
customer_reviews.author: LindaKE

customer_reviews.title: only sleep in satin
customer_reviews.text: Love the satin, skin stays moisturized. Be sure to order a size up. I'm 5'8" and weigh 145, the large is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Sexy Senior Lady

customer_reviews.title: Paper thin, transparent and oddly sized. HORRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a Med-the top was definitely a large, the pants were too short and while the width was appropriate, the thin waistband was TINY. Worst of all, the material is so thin it’s as transparent as nylons and the seam of the pants is so bad each stitch has a visible hole. They’re terrible. DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY! The ability to exchange them for a different size is pointless when they’re uneven and just horrible quality.
customer_reviews.author: Twin one

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but watch out for too narrow seams
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs of these PJs over the years. They are the most comfortable satin Pjs, at this price point, I own. These are no different, HOWEVER, after the first wash the waistband is separating from the elastic because there is not a wide enough seam allowance.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn  Louise Berman

customer_reviews.title: Very Long Pants. Size Down in General
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'4" and 140 lbs. Usually a Medium fits me perfectly. I want to like these PJs - they're soft and silky, so that's great. They wash well. But the pants are about 6" too long for my legs. The top is also larger than expected. It fits like a Large, Tall. Definitely not for petite women.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love these PJs
customer_reviews.text: Love these PJs! Everything I hoped for! I bought these for my bridesmaids and Me to wear on my wedding day when we are getting ready. I am 5'6" 120Lb, bought a small and these pjs fit perfectly in length and roominess. Also the burgundy color is beautiful and the fabric is as soft as satin should be. The stitching seems well made, but I haven't washed them yet, so hope they hold up. If not I will add that later to the review.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Addicted!
customer_reviews.text: I am so in love with these Satin Pajama's I have purchased a pair in every color. They are so very well made and the colors so vibrant and talk about feeling pampered and gorgeous while being so very comfortable! My husband loves them on me and I am now giving them as gifts to my sisters so they can feel the same! Truly a QUALITY product and I recommend them 100%! They are true to size and while I could have easily worn a 2x I chose a 3x so I could have extra room to sleep and sit in front of my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Cabrin Kelly-Hale

customer_reviews.title: A bit worn.
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. I own a Del Rossa robe, and it's of great quality, so I was disappointed to see these pajamas had some loose stands of Satin hanging out the seams. I trimmed It, it's Ok, but that should have been noticed in quality control. If someone (who was not a seamstress as I am) received this set with it's loose weaves edges, they could have easily ruined or pulled the fabric in the attempt to fix it! Quality Control Del Ross's!
customer_reviews.author: Junebug

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: One of the best pj's I've ever purchased. Product just as described - color, fabric and size as expected. Super comfortable which i didn't expect to be that comfy but they are. Length- arms and legs are perfect (bought XL to be sure i have some room to move in while i sleep) Waist elastic band. I'd but again!
customer_reviews.author: ED2

customer_reviews.title: We love the feel
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair for hubby (L steel ) and myself (S deep purple ) we both love how soft and silky they feel lounging around the house . Both colors are beautiful although the steel is a bit too masculine, I think the Iris would have suited him better. His top was long enough to cover his boy parts most of the time but the silky feel does seem to excite him when he walks around. The bottoms could have used a little tighter elastic and they did not come with a draw string. We will buy again and highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: SMROD

customer_reviews.title: The color of pj's was gorgous
customer_reviews.text: I loved the fit. Exactly as it should have fit with a little room because it's jammies. They look great, I felt comfy answering the door one early morning, felt like I was "dressed" Washed them in the washing machine with other clothing and they came out of the dryer like new. I've purchased another pair for a gift and they love them too, but haven't had to wash them just yet. Can't speak for other brands because I presume they are mfg. in another country but these are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy wash easy wear
customer_reviews.text: I usually buy 18/20 so I ordered the 2x and it fit fine. Very comfortable to sleep in and feels soft on the skin. thin enough you do not get hot when you sleep but thick enough you can wear them if company comes by. Have had no problems just throw in washer and dryer and wear. I also ordered the robe in the same color and love it as well. Look expensive
customer_reviews.author: Kim Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Nice and Satiny
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd pair of PJs I have bought from these folks and this set is a little smaller than the other one, but they still fit. The other set I bought a couple of years ago and they have finally started to pill in places from rubbing against my cotton sheets. Other than that, they are still fine. Hopefully these will last as long as the others.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty Mom

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, classy, and the pants have pockets!
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are classy and comfortable! The pants even have pockets. I am very pleased with my purchase. I have them in 3 colors and plan to buy more. Btw, my inseam is about 30" , so these for perfectly. If you have a longer inseam, you might check the next size up, or enjoy your cropped pants!
customer_reviews.author: User1953

customer_reviews.title: 2nd pair!
customer_reviews.text: These are my second pair. Super comfy. They are cool enough in the summer (although I do live up north) and warm enough in winter. My husband likes them. ;)
customer_reviews.author: Tburg Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Mom can turn so much more easily in bed now
customer_reviews.text: I bought these pajamas for my dear 94 year old mama and she LOVES them!!! She has such a hard time turning in bed and thought some "slick" jammies would not stick to the bedding. She was right! And the dark teal color looks fantastic with her white/silver hair, too!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Lou Childs

customer_reviews.title: Button's Broke After Wearing Twice
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are very comfortable, but seem to be very low quality. I know they weren't very expensive, but I would not have expected the buttons to be falling off after wearing them only twice. I would recommend staying away from these.
customer_reviews.author: Tommie

customer_reviews.title: Waistband too small but very stretchy
customer_reviews.text: The elastic waistband was too tight. I purchased XL. My waist is 38". Although the elastic is very, very stretchy, it was not comfortable to me. I like loose clothing to sleep in. I ended up cutting off the elastic and sewing in a drawstring myself. The black with grey piping is classic and that part I love. Would recommend for people with smaller waists.
customer_reviews.author: Ada L. King

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Super happy. I looked for a long time to find such a guality , elegant and good looking. I bought for me, for my sister, for my mother. I was concerned about the size. I have M and it is perfect. My mother gain weight and I wasn’t sure what size will work. I followed the measurements indicated, I ordered 2xl and it is perfect. I already ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Gabi

customer_reviews.title: Theye fit just like I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought these first in size 2X but the pants were a bit snug and the bottom button of the blouse was a bit snug. I accidentally bought a second pair in size 3X. I was going to return them, but, my daughter encouraged me to try them on. Theye fit just like I wanted. So I am buying three more 1 black, one teal and one in the Leopard print.
customer_reviews.author: Diane L. Burl

customer_reviews.title: I love these pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas. They are comfortable and thin. (I like that, but it might not be your preference) They are silky and cute. I got compliments on them as a work party. (Got bonus points for the sleeping mask) And now I wear them to bed all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Jared Viertel

customer_reviews.title: I do find these very nice and quite comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased 3 pairs of these -- red, pink, black --along with a set with a camisole top. I ordered medium since I did not want anything too tight. (I'm 5'3" and 115 lbs). The cami top is probably too loose but that's on me for not ordering a small. I believe the sizing is fairly true. I do find these very nice and quite comfortable. One note is that sain is not a "natural" material. If you want a breathable fabric pay the bigger bucks and opt for silk.
customer_reviews.author: cch1950

customer_reviews.title: Ocean color fabric smells.
customer_reviews.text: I got two of these, burgundy red and the ocean color (teal). The burgundy one was fine. They are not very breathable fabric, so they might be too hot in summer. The ocean color one smelled bad, a chemical odor. I washed them. But still the smell persists. Since I washed them, I don't know if they are returnable but I will try. So warning: if they smell chemical like, washing does not help.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product Damaged at Delivery
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this delivered to an elderly relative who is sequestered in an assisted living facility. She just let me know that it arrived "dirty" and smelled like excrement - yuk. I've never had this happen before. The window has closed on returns. What is funny is that she really liked them, but was turned off with how they arrived. I just ordered another set for her. Wish me luck!
customer_reviews.author: dawn tarin

customer_reviews.title: New fav pjs
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair of pjs. First pair were black, these are ocean. Again, xl size was loose, though the ocean perhaps slightly smaller than black. Washed on warm, dried with high heat setting and they were better fitted. Color of ocean is a bit darker IMO that appeared online which I think is lovely. These pj’s are 100% polyester with a nice medium weight to fabric that doesn’t cling or tend to attract static. Very pleased with item for this price. Plan to get a pastel color next purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P.

customer_reviews.title: Yummy, luxurious, quality pajamas!
customer_reviews.text: So happy with these pajamas! The material is a thicker, more luxurious satin than others I purchased from other sellers and because it is not silk it's machine wash and dry! The stitching is done well and the fit is as expected. High quality item that should last me for years. The mask is what made me choose this set over others and am so glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Boyd

customer_reviews.title: So comfy, fit great, has pockets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these pajamas! Normally, I don't like to wear the bottoms of pajamas to bed because they twist around and are annoying, but because these are satin, they just move with you making them comfy and easy to sleep with. I bought them to have a nice top to wear to bed and to have a nice looking set to wear around the house, but to be able to actually sleep comfortably in both the pants and top is a bonus. The size fits as expected - I bought a large, I'm 5' 8" tall and about 155 lbs - measurements of me: 36, 30, 40 and the large fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Schenry

customer_reviews.title: Satin PJs that fit well and I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the set and the top fits as well as the bottom and they are sized to match better than some PJ's where the bottom is off sized to the top. I bought this as a gift for my mom and the only thing that is a problem is I will have to hem them but not a big deal to me. The fit in the waste and hips is great too. The top fits perfect. I would definitely be buying again and I recommend them. My mom is a 3x and I bought a 3x great fit
customer_reviews.author: Lula Richardson

customer_reviews.title: They've held up nice. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Well I'm still wearing them a year later. They've held up nice. Very comfortable. Wore them to work for a pajama day event and got a lot of compliments and comments that I looked like Bruno Mars. So you want some nice pjs? Want all the compliments? Want to look like Bruno Mars from that one album? Get these pajamas. The face mask kind of sucks though. But that doesn't really matter.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice pjs for flannel sheets
customer_reviews.text: I must confess I have never wanted satin pjs, but when I bought flannel sheets for the Minnesota winter I needed pjs that make it easy to turn without sticking like Velcro in bed. These are just the ticket! The legs are long enough to cover my ankles and the size is correct. I liked these so much I bought two pairs, one for each set of sheets. They’ve been washed a couple of times and seem well-made. I’m pleased.
customer_reviews.author: M in Minnesota

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for restless sleeper
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these pjs. Never liked before. I'm a restless sleeper and can't abide constriction or entanglement. These slide easily over bedding leaving me to sleep soundly and peacefully.
customer_reviews.author: Denver Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Lovely pajamas
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is nice although slightly thinner than I had hoped for. There's nothing wrong with it, it's just my personal preference for a little heavier fabric. The colour is beautiful and they are very well-made, fit well (true to size), and are very comfortable. The pants have two pockets, one on each side, and the shirt has one pocket. I highly recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: C. Tilden

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Fabric, fit is fine
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful Fabric, fit is fine. My Wife put them on for the 2nd or 3rd time and the leg seam split easily as if poorly sewn??? We’ve had them a few weeks & I’ve ordered 6-7 sets of PJ’s from this Company. This is our first quality issue ever. I didn’t contact the Company since we’ve had them awhile. I think this is just one of the items perhaps missed during QC inspection??
customer_reviews.author: DDF

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought matching pairs for my daughter and I. The fabric quality is pretty good. Great for the cost. I did size up for me. I’m a 16/18 bottom. I ordered a 2X but returned for 3X because the hip area just fit. Satin doesn’t stretch. Well, the 3X is pretty big and too long. I kept anyway because they were comfortable. My daughter’s fit great. She’s 12/ size Y14. I got her a women’s Small and they fit great. The color is pretty.
customer_reviews.author: Housewife

customer_reviews.title: No sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: They are the most comfy pjs I have ever slept in. I like large so I don’t mind they are big on me. I also don’t need sleep masks, but I have received two of the three I ordered and neither came with a sleep mask. If the mask is important to you, you should talk to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Accent On Interpreting

customer_reviews.title: Goldilocks of pajamas
customer_reviews.text: So smooth so comfy so luxurious! I want them in every color only way they would be better is if they had pockets in the pants. The eye cover isn’t very nice but the pants and shirt quickly replaced my favorite pajamas. They are the Goldie locks of sleepwear keep you cool and not hot just right all night!
customer_reviews.author: Ecasla24

customer_reviews.title: Rich color, great fit, happy wife!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my wife, size small for 5'2, petite, they fit exactly as expected. She loves them and they look great on her. I got her the black pair with the white trim, and since she was so pleased with them I ended up getting her another pair. This time in the maroon-ish color. The color is rich and now she's set for the cooler days this season. Happy wife and great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Shad G.

customer_reviews.title: Thin Fabric
customer_reviews.text: I bought them for winter, but the fabric is thin, If you hold them up to light you can see thru them. The top is a little bigger than I expected. In the old days I would wear a Medium, but now a 'days I wear medium or large or extra-large depending on the maker. But I am keeping them only because I hate sending stuff back.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: or doing anything concerning water it splashes on the PJs and the stain just SITS THERE it doesn't absorb like it would on most
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size up (XL) and they fit just right a little loose but they are soft and comfy. The two issues I have with these though is that when I'm washing the dishes, or doing anything concerning water it splashes on the PJs and the stain just SITS THERE it doesn't absorb like it would on most clothing. Just looks really tacky once wet.. not sure how well it will wash out yet. Also the sleeves are hard to keep rolled up. I would advise putting them on right before you get into bed and not a moment before...
customer_reviews.author: Inez

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pajamas
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are very pretty. I ordered Ocean Depth and Wisteria. The color's are beautiful, the fabric is nice. I have ordered VSecret satin pajamas in the past. The fabric is not as heavy as VSecret Pj's but they have a nice weigh for sleeping. I ordered a size larger than I usually wear, because I like my pjs loose. The fit was fabulous. I have not washed them yet, will wash on a delicate cycle. All in all very pleased with these pajamas..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Elastic waist too tight
customer_reviews.text: Everything was fine except that I found elastic around waist too tight for 'loungewear'. I have a 26 inch waist and the medium pajamas fit me perfectly, except the elastic waist was uncomfortably snug for pajamas. For day wear it would be okay but at night, I want my clothes to fit loosely or the elastic to have more give than these.
customer_reviews.author: Barbarella

customer_reviews.title: Im usually a size small (2/4) but seeing as I wanted them to be oversized I got a medium and they fit really nice and roomy
customer_reviews.text: These are really surprisingly soft and warm. Very shiny and silky looking, however they do have a tendency to get static and stick to the body. Im usually a size small (2/4) but seeing as I wanted them to be oversized I got a medium and they fit really nice and roomy. I'm 5'3'' and the pants were a tad long on me but thats ok. Overall I think these PJ's are really great for the price, they look nice, and are softer than I expected. Plus the little sleep mask that comes with it is a perk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love satin pajamas and was sad that Target only has ...
customer_reviews.text: I love satin pajamas and was sad that Target only has them seasonally. I am a size 14 and these pajamas were definitely larger than the standard XL but it was good for me because I often find pj's that fit right have a problem in the chest area exposing skin between the buttons. This did not fit in a sexy way and I wouldn't choose them for sexiness but it was very comfortable and gave me a lot of moving room for sleeping in. I got it in plum and the color was just like the photo -cranberry plum purple.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi P

customer_reviews.title: This is a NO
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality satin. Waist is very small and thin elestic. Top is short and pants legs are very wide. Would NOT advise buying these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better price!
customer_reviews.text: Although I am a size 6 on the bottom, I’m large on the top and ordered Size Large. They fit great, I like my pj’s loose and beautifully made considering being very inexpensive. I loved the eye mask which matches. Great price and made well and delivered in 1.5 days. I’ll buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Makes you feel like a pampered queen...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the feel of these..I bought them for a friends birthday..every woman needs to feel silk or satan against their skin at least once in their life...they feel WONDERFULL..material is soft & very expensive feeling..great fit..great price..my friend loves them...
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice McGee

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are WAY off.
customer_reviews.text: The size and chose was listed at XL size 12 to 16. I wear a size 14 so I ordered three thinking they’d be perfect. Wrong. The top was huge and the bottoms small in the rise and waist. Thinking women size 12 to 16 can wear the same garment is way off. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I am going to have shoulder replacement surgery and will need to put on pants and shirts using only one hand. The smooth and slippery fabric and stretchy elastic waistband works well for this purpose. The only issue for me (5’5” tall) is the pants are about 3” too long.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought three sets for myself and my bridesmaids. My bridesmaids are very different ages and size, and I needed something that would be comfortable for everyone. They are so comfy and cute! I haven't washed them yet, so I can't attest to the durability, but I loved wearing them and they will be perfect for my photos. I went a size up for the baggy feel.
customer_reviews.author: Kari R.

customer_reviews.title: 3x? More like 1x
customer_reviews.text: Cheaply made and very thin fabric. Not even true to size. Runs extremely small and 3 x did not even fit.
customer_reviews.author: VI-VI-VI

customer_reviews.title: Great satin pj.
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these satin pajamas. My only complaint is I need to shorten the bottoms my 7 inches. This product is delivered as predicted. The quality is great. They wash up beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Clemens

customer_reviews.title: Frayed hems, too short & big.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly however disappointed in quality. Threads were showing & frayed. I’m 5’8” 122lbs ordered size small pants were more like crop pants hitting above ankles & top was still very big. I like baggy but this was still to much. Will be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Jana Auvil

customer_reviews.title: Prettiest, softest, most flattering pj set ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love it, I want to buy it in other colors too, it’s so soft, you barely feel it on your skin, so comfortable, feels like real silk, so feminine, just the right fit, and my new favorite. Looks SO luxurious!!
customer_reviews.author: BasselAreej

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced, thin fabric.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pair of pajamas, mostly based on reviews. I am extremely disappointed with the product because the material is a very thin tightly woven polyester, which does not breathe at all. I do not expect these to last more than one season. Next time I need silk-like PJs,I will run over to Marshall's, where you can pick up muchhigher quality pajamas for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. I am a tiny human and the elastic ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. I am a tiny human and the elastic on the small is so tight I would never be able to be comfortable in these, yet they are very baggy in the legs. Also the arms are short. I'd describe the feel of the material as slippery, not soft. I've never returned something so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory

customer_reviews.title: My Husband is Deceased. He was the Account Holder
customer_reviews.text: My Husband ordered for me before HE died . He died on May 8th. And the Alexander Del Rossa Women's Button Down Satin Pajama Set with Sleep Mask, WAS NEVER USED BY ME. My Husband and I spent these last months in the hospital until His Death. Honestly , the color of the Pajamas, Black Color, I don't like , and besides there is a poorly sewn trim from the Top of the Pajamas. PLEASE, I would like to do the EXCHANGE OF COLOR. I am the Widow , and My Name is ROSA TANNER. And Hopefully I can here from you . THANKS.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Tanner

customer_reviews.title: No sleep mask
customer_reviews.text: love satin pajamas, was worried they might run small so i ordered a sz up-which was larger than what i needed. I ordered a pair for my sisterinlaw and myself for our upcoming trip. I didn't get the sleep mask with mine (normally I doubt I would ever use it but we were going to be silly and take a picture with our pajamas and mask on) all in all I'm happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific value, we'll made and very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Bought it in size small and it is a perfect fit for my small (5 ft.) frame. I would suggest buying a medium or large for those whose dress size is larger than size 6.
customer_reviews.author: R. Heller

customer_reviews.title: BAD!  Del Rossa neck tags SCRATCHED & caused INFECTIONS!!  Don't Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: – BAD! Del Rossa neck tags SCRATCHED & caused INFECTIONS! Don't Buy!! – BAD! Inner seams – unfinished & not folded over ! ! – They Scratch & Itch all day & night long ! ! Don't Buy!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky Carter

customer_reviews.title: Just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These Dela Rossa PJs are the best sleepwear I have ever owned. I was concerned that they were not lined with a warm cloth lining but truly it made no difference. They were large for me but I ordered large in case they ran small. I ordered a second pair a size down and am eagerly awaiting their arrival. High quality. Very comfortable. Beautiful in appearance. Worth every cent spent.
customer_reviews.author: church lady

customer_reviews.title: Larger than expected.
customer_reviews.text: These seem nice but also seem very large. I ordered the XL based on the details and they are way too big for my wife. I'm a 6'1", 200lb man and these fit me perfectly. :) I'll be keeping them for myself.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: These PHs are exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: I can not sleep in cottons, flannels, shorts, nightgowns, etc. I must have silky PJs! These are exactly what I need! The color (purple) is gorgeous! The fit is much better than expected. They were received very quickly after I placed my order. And the price is the best I found! THANK YOU for giving me what I needed/wanted!!
customer_reviews.author: Ginny

customer_reviews.title: Sizing a little off
customer_reviews.text: Pj's bottoms not only way to long but inseam measures an inch different on legs. The shoulders to big but gets tight as you get to the bottom of the top. Color great and very soft and smooth to sleep in. I didn't get the mask. That item was left out of my order and I would really have liked to have the mask.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A.

customer_reviews.title: I love leopard print
customer_reviews.text: these are beautiful--little tight but I have lost 10 lbs so maybe the way they fit will be better soon--but I have a hard time not sliding out of bed so I think I am a flannel not satin person
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Kay Lucas

customer_reviews.title: good--but do get pulls in them
customer_reviews.text: although very light weight, these are quite warm--sometimes too warm for me (but i have issues that make me too warm). the colors are beautiful and the fit is great. i bought 2 pair. the only problem is they can get pulls in them rather easily, which has been an issue with my cat's claws. but otherwise they are great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love these! Well made and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these! Well made and comfortable. I like satin/silk PJs because it's easier to turn in bed with something that slides across the sheets. These are great. An added bonus that I didn't see in the photo until just now is that a matching sleep mask comes with the PJs.
customer_reviews.author: L. Link

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beware: The dyes transfer. I've washed these pjs several times and the dyes still mess up my bedsheets.
customer_reviews.author: J. T.

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves her valentine present. Will buy her more for her birthday.
customer_reviews.author: gary b.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5"2', 105lbs purchased S/M. Lovely mauve/pink satin, for me the mask was a great bonus. Arrived quickly. I'm very satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mishka

customer_reviews.title: So silky and affordable
customer_reviews.text: Love how it looks and feels! Love that they have pockets!
customer_reviews.author: ismael

customer_reviews.title: No piping as shown in the picture
customer_reviews.text: I got a medium and it was a little too loose on me but that’s probably me choosing the wrong size. Nice material. My only negative about this is the actual pajamas don’t have the piping as shown in the picture. If you look at the other pics posted by the other reviewers, there is also no piping in their pajamas. I would’ve wanted piping on mine - would have made a difference.
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: comfortable fit
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this pj. Pant length is just right. Lots of room in shoulder fittings. Doesn't bunch or bind when tossing in bed. Not heavy and doesn't wrinkle. Soft to the touch. Seams are all sewn well. All in all, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful and silky make great gifts
customer_reviews.text: I bought myself a pair of these pajamas and one for all the ladies in my family for Christmas as well. They come in a plastic bag so if you plan to give as a gift be aware that you will need to sort out better gift wrapping. That being said the pajamas are lovely the colors are rich, I found they ran true to size, and the fabric is very comfortable and so far seem well made. I have washed them several times with no issues. The sleep mask was a nice bonus. I am considering also purchasing a matching robe from this compmany.
customer_reviews.author: Comment Sense

customer_reviews.title: WORSE PURCHASE FOR ME
customer_reviews.text: VERY DISAPPOINTING!! The size is soooo wrong. No way this is a plus size measurement. I could put up with how thin the material is, but I can't wear it at all. A waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen C.

customer_reviews.title: and beautiful. They also launder well and don't require any ...
customer_reviews.text: These are soft, slippery, and beautiful. They also launder well and don't require any special care or ironing. I plan to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Manning

customer_reviews.title: The waist elastic is not too tight and they fit like a dream
customer_reviews.text: These are wrinkle free and always look fresh..Wash and dry in nothing flat. Colors are vibrant and the sets are well made. The waist elastic is not too tight and they fit like a dream.. Only complaint and it is small, I am 5ft 8inches and the length of the legs is actually a little too long but a nice surprise for someone who has always had leg length problems before. All in all I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Good product fits oddly
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are well made and very attractive. Great color. Too small in pants but top is just right. The legs are too long by about 6 inches, but the sleeves are just right. I have not had this out of proportion sizing happen with other brands of clothing. I would prefer to be able to choose a lesser price without a sleep mask.
customer_reviews.author: J in Mid-Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful color but pants were too tight
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered the wisperia color and I have to said “it was beautiful” It’s kind of lilac . The problem was that the pants were too tight on the waist area so I ordered a size up (XL) and it was still too tight. Sadly I ended up returning them (I’m 5’7 with 17O pounds.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: That's too bad, because I would have loved to buy more ...
customer_reviews.text: It arrived promptly, but it must have been made for a man. It is 2 numbers smaller around the hips and are way too long. That's too bad, because I would have loved to buy more of them
customer_reviews.author: Dez

customer_reviews.title: Silver Set has a rough feel to
customer_reviews.text: I bought this set in practically every color and the others are very soft, for some reason this particular silver color has a rougher stiff feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for my mom and she loves them! She's had the same pair of satin PJs for years and swears by them. Great color and size, super comfy. Only thing is that they arent as warm as she wish theyd be. Great buy otherwise!
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: These PJ's are very warm and suitable for winter wear.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: My second pair
customer_reviews.text: I just love my new Alexander Del Rossa jammies. They fit great, feel great, and if my new ones are like my first, they wash and wear great. If you want affordable sexy pajamas, I recommend Alexander Del Rossa
customer_reviews.author: LIZ FOWLER

customer_reviews.title: she loves them and they look great on her
customer_reviews.text: she loves them and they look great on her. If you want good products with great service at a really good price, try amazon first. I have had two misses, my fault on size and replaced with correct size. I can always depend on Amazon and their suppliers for what I need. Don't need brick and mortar, they don't have it anyway. Talk about smooth pajamas, these are the best.
customer_reviews.author: David 379

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.text: One sleeve was smaller than the other and didn't fit right. The top of the pants were small while the legs were right size. I am returning and will never buy these or from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Keep it classy
customer_reviews.text: "I have to admit, I was pretty intimidated by you when we first started living together. You always wore your satin pajamas and looked like an old Hollywood star." I smirked when my roommate told me that. I hadn't meant to be intimidating but if you grew up on a steady diet of classic Hollywood movies, you too know how glamorous satin pajamas can look. And if you buy a pair of these, you'll know how wonderful they feel on your skin. I can't recommend these highly enough!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Buys (and Tries) Stuff

customer_reviews.title: Don't bother
customer_reviews.text: We ordered pink, and it came in lavender. The fit was too small, and the fabric is cheap. Certainly not worth the cost. I sent it back today. I will give them this though, it didn't cost me anything to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: D. Hooks

feature_bullets: RISK FREE GUARANTEE - We know that one of the biggest drawbacks to buying sleepwear online is the fact that you can't try the product in person - that is why we absorb that risk for you. Order this lightweight pajama set now and if you are not completely satisfied, you can send it back, no questions asked. Enjoy the freedom of shopping from your couch (in your pjs, next time!)
LIGHTWEIGHT AND COMFY - This lightweight pajama set is made from premium silky satin to keep you covered without weighing you down. Enjoy the comfort of satin all year long.
OXFORD STYLE SET - Long-sleeve top features button-down front for easy on, easy off wear; Full-length bottoms feature elastic waist for a secure fit and maximum comfort
MASK INCLUDED - Relax in total darkness with coordinating sleep mask; Perfect for those with insomnia, migraine headaches and dry eyes

GIVE THE GIFT OF RELAXATION -A comfortable pj set is a thoughtful way of telling her "You deserve to relax". A pajama set is one of those rare gifts that everyone can enjoy but few people purchase for themselves, making it the perfect present for Christmas, Mother's Day or her birthday.
